title: Custom item sets not showing up ingame.
body: Okay so, i've created two custom classes for Soraka one for Ai players and PVP. I have saved them both and i have selected the correct maps and specific Champion, when i go into a game there is no arrow/tap under recommended to access them, please help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds odd, could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me. Let me know if this helps.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=TZPdA7bU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-11T10:03:17.121+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> That sounds odd, could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me. Let me know if this helps.

hey i just did that and went into a game and it still didn't work. A while ago a friend went on my account to try and fixed it and it worked on their computer, if that helps to narrow down the problem.
Are you launching the game as Administrator? (Right click > run as admin)
Smart thinking. Just tried it then, didn't seem to do anything different.
